We strive to provide useful and transparent information on ICOs, helping users find projects that have a great potential for success. We also offer a whitelabel platform for ICO projects (Wallet, tokensale system, smart contract, audit and etc) to present themselves to potential users. Body: Hello, good question There will be two types of service levels: 1. Managed ‚Äî when the entire software system and  BIT token balance of the merchant are managed by BitRewards. That would be $0/month. 2. On-premise ‚Äî when the merchant has its own server with Ethereum node for managing the BIT tokens. That would be about $10/month. Also, we are going to introduce a transaction fee for BIT token transfers from shops to users. We'll do it not earlier than after a year of operations, and probably later. The commission fee will not exceed 0.5%, probably will be lower, depending on the BIT token demand.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Thank you for the question, since a lot of retailers are not quite ready to work with cryptocurrency exchanges directly, operations will be handled through the BitRewards‚Äô operator company. The operator will deal with all crypto transactions between the merchant and the customer and will give the bill in USD for the merchant.

Body: No, it isn't. We are in the business for 5 years, working together at GIFTD (https://giftd.tech ) and building valuable marketing tools for e-commerce (see "Live Demo" on https://bitrewards.network). That makes us very different from the most of ICO projects in general, and loyalty-connected ICOs particularly. Also, there was almost nothing in Benebit's idea excepting the cashback, while we focus on many different rewards: cashback, friends referred bonus, likes & shares on social networks, product reviews, video reviews, website reviews, bug reports, etc. Our software is an advanced thing and it can be customized to any e-commerce business needs.

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Hello! Savedroid focuses on savings in cryptocurrencies and plays on the B2C field. Basically, they take a % from your bank account, convert it to various cryptocurrencies and that's pretty much all. We focus on bringing blockchain & cryptocurrency to loyalty space and play on the B2B2C field. We bring merchants a top quality loyalty software, which rewards their customers with crypto. Users will be incentivized by shops with our cryptocurrency BIT for purchases,  for friends referred, product reviews, video reviews, bug reports, likes, shares, etc. So we have almost nothing in similar with that project.

Body: Hi! Unlike many other blockchain startups, we anticipate that only 27% of the total costs will be spent on product development because a lot of essential components of the system have already been developed and tested. The funds that we raise beyond the soft cap will be invested in sales marketing activities, which will help us sign up more merchants more quickly, creating a stronger network effect and delivering the product features faster. Additional funds will also be used for the opening of new geographical markets faster.

Among the globally recognized names, we have GoPro.ru, Tui, and several others; we also service Snowqueen.ru, a top Russian fashion and beauty retailer (2.5 million monthly visitors), Startuphouse.com (the startup community in San Francisco, USA), Premierdeadsea-usa.com (skincare products, USA), MadRobots.ru (a marketplace of gadgets), Promosoundgroup.net (global online music promotion service), Marwin.kz (top Kazakh kids' store) and hundreds of the smaller businesses. For BitRewards, we have signed the letter of intent with Ecwid (https://goo.gl/2HnrG5), one of the top e-commerce website builders with over 1 million merchants in 175 countries headquartered in San Diego, CA, USA.

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: I want to clarify more on this question. It's actually a very good question, thank you for that. We are much more than a cashback platform. We will give shoppers cashback in cryptocurrency, referral rewards in crypto, social actions rewards in crypto, etc., etc. Here is how we are going to work with cashback platforms such as LetyShops: 1. For those of them, which will collaborate with us, we will provide a solution to replace a cashback in fiat with cashback in BIT. So essentially they will become another source of the demand on BIT tokens. The interface, the brand, the website will stay the same for the shoppers, but the reward will change  to BIT token from fiat. 2. As to those which will not collaborate with us, we are going to take their share of the market ?? as cashback in cryptocurrency is much more appealing to the end users than cashback in fiat.

Body: Hello, actually, it performs well for merchants using GIFTD. In 2016 we finally saw a spike in the sale of e-gift cards for our clients! The customers got a taste of the convenience of instant gifting, while right on the website's store. We expect this trend to continue since 10% of all purchases are made as gifts (which are often made last minute).

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Regarding Retainly - it's for sure an interesting project that deserves some attention. However, it's not accurate to compare it with BitRewards for a number of reasons: 1) One thing is to talk, another one is to show. BitRewards is based and backed by a successful product - GIFTD - that was launched in 2012. Our team have enough expertise to extract the most from the distributed ledger technology to apply an innovative approach towards loyalty management market. Working product means a lot. 2) We focus not only on cash-backs but on any reward systems, so giving customers a freedom to choose. It also gives a necessary flexibility to BitRewards regarding different market trends. 3) We share the same spirit - to provide every citizen with cryptocurrency, though the realization differs - the RETN token economy is totally unclear from the whitepaper. Also, the liquidity issue has no place in it, whereas we describe token liquidity in detail. All in all, we're open for potential co-ops as the only reasonable goal for us is to make the loyalty management market more efficient and beneficial for all the participants.

Body: Hello, if a merchant tries to cheat and sends fake data, it will be detected, and this information will go to the Ethereum blockchain, operator will decrease this merchant's reputation, If the reputation is unreliable, the weight of the sent data is set to ‚Äúlow‚Äù, or it is simply ignored

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: We are much more than a cashback platform. We will give shoppers cashback in cryptocurrency, referral rewards in crypto, social actions rewards in crypto, etc., etc. Here is how we are going to work with cashback platforms such as LetyShops: 1. For those of them, which will collaborate with us, we will provide a solution to replace a cashback in fiat with cashback in BIT. So essentially they will become another source of the demand for BIT tokens. The interface, the brand, the website will stay the same for the shoppers, but the reward will change to BIT token from fiat. 2. As to those which will not collaborate with us, we are going to take their share of the market ?? as cashback in cryptocurrency is much more appealing to the end users than cashback in fiat. BIT tokens are an Etherium based currency. In case of the listing at the exchange, it will be possible to change them into crypto or fiat currency ‚Äî everything that the exchanges allow to do.

Body: We are closely watching our competitors working on loyalty and rewards blockchain projects. And we have a few strong competitive advantages. Body: Hello, please understand that it‚Äôs not that straightforward. It depends a lot on the specific settings for every merchant. We are combining the rewards that you can use only in the given store with the incentives that stimulate better than points to buy and refer friends Think of a blogger who posted a link to a store‚Äôs product to his followers incentivized by a chance to earn crypto on their purchases. She wouldn‚Äôt have done so for the points. We are offering the solution which will mix both internal points and open-loop crypto rewards to achieve the maximum efficiency Also, don't forget that crypto rewards would be a great attractor of sales for any shop. People would love receiving crypto-cashback and other crypto-rewards, so they would be more at the shop offering them. That's another piece of value that we bring to e-commerce.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: We are constantly working on the customer development, and know the needs of our customers, e-commerce businesses very well. They are struggling with attraction, conversion, activation, and retention of their users and want a solution.  The statistics show that online merchants are spending annually billions of dollars on such solutions and often do so extremely inefficiently - over 50% of loyalty programs are closing within the first year after the launch, because they don‚Äôt pay off and create more customer frustration, than satisfaction  The user experiences in loyalty programs leave much to be desired, leading to clients frustration and worsening of their loyalty.  BitRewards will equip the merchants with the premium set of tools, which will increase their revenue by double-digit percentages. The software, which usually costs hundreds of dollars will be offered free of charge.  We don't plan to impose the limitations on the merchants ‚Äî they can both issue points or BIT tokens to reward their users on our system. E.g., they can choose to reward for shares and likes with points, and for the purchases of the referred friends with the crypto. We aim to give the suite of tools that solve the merchants' problems better, rather than tie them  our platform. It will result in broader adoption in the long run  The merchants want to have a tool that enables them rewarding not only with points, but with something the users deem more valuable - cash, or cryptocurrency (which in certain aspects is better than cash).  The adoption from the stores presently will, besides the other factors, be driven by the fact that rewarding in crypto helps to stand out among the competition, and in the future, it will become the industry standard and will be demanded by the users.  The question of the ban on crypto often arises. However, it will already hardly be possible. We are following the regulators and in reality, approve of the majority of their decisions. Because they show the desire to shield the large public from scam, misconduct, and negligence, rather than uproot the cryptocurrencies as a class. SEC's head of blockchain division is actually very supportive of the blockchain technology and cryptocurrency developments. Regulators have hard times now figuring out how to approach a lot of concepts and technologies, as the speed of evolution is extraordinary.  Therefore we are most assured that very soon the crypto will become a standard of the retail industry and will be adopted by almost every store. It's not hard to figure out how to legitimize the typical retail transactions in crypto, and given that a lot of great minds are applying their skills to this area, it's a matter short time when we will see it. If you think about it, crypto is much safer and more transparent, than physical paper cash, in which no one objects transacting.

Body: Hello, Feltana! Savedroid focuses on savings in cryptocurrencies and plays on the B2C field. Basically, they take a % from your bank account, convert it to various cryptocurrencies and that's pretty much all. We focus on bringing blockchain & cryptocurrency to loyalty space and play on the B2B2C field. We bring merchants a top quality loyalty software, which rewards their customers with crypto. Users will be incentivized by shops with our cryptocurrency BIT for purchases,  for friends referred, product reviews, video reviews, bug reports, likes, shares, etc. So we have almost nothing in similar with that project.

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Hello No, we won't like to share it publicly as ICO market is a competitive space. However, some details may be shared already. We pursue a weighted strategy with regard to the online marketing campaign, so we've split it into three stages: - collection of analytics, targeting, key audiences - testing of segments in different countries, content adaptation, creatives and formats testing - full-scale ad coverage and targeting in chosen countries

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Good question! There will be two types of service levels: 1. Managed ‚Äî when the entire software system and  BIT token balance of the merchant are managed by BitRewards. That would be $0/month. 2. On-premise ‚Äî when the merchant has its own server with Ethereum node for managing the BIT tokens. That would be about $10/month. Also, we are going to introduce a transaction fee for BIT token transfers from shops to users. We'll do it not earlier than after a year of operations, and probably later. The commission fee will not exceed 0.5%, probably will be lower, depending on the BIT token demand.

One of these actors (and probably the most important one) would be the BitRewards company. The Foundation itself would be managed by the BitRewards DAO, as described in the WhitePaper (pages 32-33).

Body: Good morning, Let's say you notice that the store is trying to send inaccurate information about sales to the system, and this is repeated several times in a row. What will be your actions?

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: It's actually a very good question, thank you for that. We are much more than a cashback platform. We will give shoppers cashback in cryptocurrency, referral rewards in crypto, social actions rewards in crypto, etc., etc. Here is how we are going to work with cashback platforms such as LetyShops: 1. For those of them, which will collaborate with us, we will provide a solution to replace a cashback in fiat with cashback in BIT. So essentially they will become another source of the demand on BIT tokens. The interface, the brand, the website will stay the same for the shoppers, but the reward will change  to BIT token from fiat. 2. As to those which will not collaborate with us, we are going to take their share of the market üôÇ as cashback in cryptocurrency is much more appealing to the end users than cashback in fiat.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Hello Feltana, it does not seem unfairly large to us. That power allows the system to be developed in a timely manner. And if something goes wrong, the community has the power to revoke the Super User permission.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Hello If a merchant tries to cheat and sends fake data, it will be detected, and this information will go to the Ethereum blockchain, operator will decrease this merchant's reputation, If the reputation is unreliable, the weight of the sent data is set to ‚Äúlow‚Äù, or it is simply ignored

Body: We are much more than a cashback platform. We will give shoppers cashback in cryptocurrency, referral rewards in crypto, social actions rewards in crypto, etc., etc. Here is how we are going to work with cashback platforms such as LetyShops: 1. For those of them, which will collaborate with us, we will provide a solution to replace a cashback in fiat with cashback in BIT. So essentially they will become another source of the demand for BIT tokens. The interface, the brand, the website will stay the same for the shoppers, but the reward will change to BIT token from fiat. 2. As to those which will not collaborate with us, we are going to take their share of the market ?? as cashback in cryptocurrency is much more appealing to the end users than cashback in fiat. BIT tokens are an Etherium based currency. In case of the listing at the exchange, it will be possible to change them into crypto or fiat currency ‚Äî everything that the exchanges allow to do.

Body: Token Sale Volume is up to  1,280,000,000 Token Issue Volume is up to  2,000,000,000  Our tokens max issue depends on two things: the USD equivalent of the funds collected during ICO and the sale close date (May 31st currently, may happen earlier if we reach the $15 mln hard cap earlier). Body: No, it isn't. First, we are real people ?? We are in the business for 5 years, working together at GIFTD (https://giftd.tech ) and building valuable marketing tools for e-commerce (see "Live Demo" on https://bitrewards.network). That makes us very different from the most of ICO projects in general, and loyalty-connected ICOs particularly. Also, there was almost nothing in Benebit's idea excepting the cashback, while we focus on many different rewards: cashback, friends referred bonus, likes & shares on social networks, product reviews, video reviews, website reviews, bug reports, etc. Our software is an advanced thing and it can be customized to any e-commerce business needs.

Body: Hello! There is no affection at all. The customer will either sell his 1 BIT or keep it. If he sells it, it will make a price a little lower than $100. If he keeps it, it will drive a price of BIT above $100. The store is independent of the BIT/USD price, please check out our previous answer. The rewards in BIT will be less when the BIT price is up. When the merchant wants to reward a $1000 buyer with $50 cash back, our software will automatically buy BIT tokens for $50 on the exchange and give them to the customer. So the merchant is independent of the token volatility.

Body: Please understand that it‚Äôs not that straightforward. It depends a lot on the specific settings for every merchant. We are combining the rewards that you can use only in the given store with the incentives that stimulate better than points to buy and refer friends Think of a blogger who posted a link to a store‚Äôs product to his followers incentivized by a chance to earn crypto on their purchases. She wouldn‚Äôt have done so for the points. We are offering the solution which will mix both internal points and open-loop crypto rewards to achieve the maximum efficiency Also, don't forget that crypto rewards would be a great attractor of sales for any shop. People would love receiving crypto-cashback and other crypto-rewards, so they would be more at the shop offering them. That's another piece of value that we bring to e-commerce.

Body: There will be two types of service levels: 1. Managed ‚Äî when the entire software system and  BIT token balance of the merchant are managed by BitRewards. That would be $0/month. 2. On-premise ‚Äî when the merchant has its own server with Ethereum node for managing the BIT tokens. That would be about $10/month. Also, we are going to introduce a transaction fee for BIT token transfers from shops to users. We'll do it not earlier than after a year of operations, and probably later. The commission fee will not exceed 0.5%, probably will be lower, depending on the BIT token demand.

Body: Since a lot of retailers are not quite ready to work with cryptocurrency exchanges directly, operations will be handled through the BitRewards‚Äô operator company. The operator will deal with all crypto transactions between the merchant and the customer and will give the bill in USD for the merchant.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Thank you for the question! Regarding Retainly - it's for sure an interesting project that deserves some attention. However, it's not accurate to compare it with BitRewards for a number of reasons: 1) One thing is to talk, another one is to show. BitRewards is based and backed by a successful product - GIFTD - that was launched in 2012. Our team have enough expertise to extract the most from the distributed ledger technology to apply an innovative approach towards loyalty management market. Working product means a lot. 2) We focus not only on cash-backs but on any reward systems, so giving customers a freedom to choose. It also gives a necessary flexibility to BitRewards regarding different market trends. 3) We share the same spirit - to provide every citizen with cryptocurrency, though the realization differs - the RETN token economy is totally unclear from the whitepaper. Also, the liquidity issue has no place in it, whereas we describe token liquidity in detail. All in all, we're open for potential co-ops as the only reasonable goal for us is to make the loyalty management market more efficient and beneficial for all the participants.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: As soon as the Lightning Network and Raiden Network technologies become available, the BitRewards Wallet will be integrated with them and become a part of these networks. It will speed up transactions to a few seconds.

Body: The Foundation manages the relationships with the different services providers, BIT tokens and cash reserves, remunerates the actors within the system that create the most value for the proliferation of BitRewards platform. One of these actors (and probably the most important one) would be the BitRewards company. The Foundation itself would be managed by the BitRewards DAO, as described in the WhitePaper (pages 32-33).

Body: Hello! Yes, you can. As far as we accept only ETH or BTC, you may need to buy them for any fiat currencies at crypto-exchanges. While processing the exchange or transfer operation, please, specify the receiving/destination ETH or BTC wallet address provided in your personal online cabinet. Once the transaction is completed, the corresponding amount of tokens will be allocated to your personal account. Notice that exchanges and payment/transfer services may apply some additional fees - please, estimate the amount of your transfer accordingly.

Body: Hello, Jeroyc! Savedroid focuses on savings in cryptocurrencies and plays on the B2C field. Basically, they take a % from your bank account, convert it to various cryptocurrencies and that's pretty much all. We focus on bringing blockchain & cryptocurrency to loyalty space and play on the B2B2C field. We bring merchants a top quality loyalty software, which rewards their customers with crypto. Users will be incentivized by shops with our cryptocurrency BIT for purchases,  for friends referred, product reviews, video reviews, bug reports, likes, shares, etc. So we have almost nothing in similar with that project.

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Why did we come to this decision?  1. At the moment we are negotiating with the top exchanges, one of which is HitBTC ‚Äî a well-known platform. As the possible date for the listing of BIT token is no sooner than the first half of June, we decided to extend the opportunity of participating in our token sale. 2. While we are waiting for the listing, thanks to the open sale, we will be able to work with the big partners interested in a large purchase of BIT tokens. This will positively affect the liquidity of the token, and it is strategically important for the successful listing. At the moment, we are already in the process of business development with some of the major Asian companies. 3. This is not going to affect our roadmap in any way. As promised, we will start the distribution of tokens on the  9th of May. That‚Äôs why, for those who will purchase BIT tokens after May 9th we offer no discount ‚Äî we are pursuing a fair approach for all contributors.

Body: We plan to fully open source our platform and provide the tools' code to the developers so that they can use the existing or create new features or new tools on the top of the platform, offer them to the online stores on their own and earn their commission in BIT tokens.  The IP on the platform and the tools is owned by our mother company, www.giftd.tech, and our lawyers are planning the activities for transfer of IP rights and registration of patents to BitRewards starting from the first quarter of 2018. We also hold some AI-related patents, which will be used in the BitRewards tools.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Hello! Let me answer that question! Regarding Retainly - it's for sure an interesting project that deserves some attention. However, it's not accurate to compare it with BitRewards for a number of reasons: 1) One thing is to talk, another one is to show. BitRewards is based and backed by a successful product - GIFTD - that was launched in 2012. Our team have enough expertise to extract the most from the distributed ledger technology to apply an innovative approach towards loyalty management market. Working product means a lot. 2) We focus not only on cash-backs but on any reward systems, so giving customers a freedom to choose. It also gives a necessary flexibility to BitRewards regarding different market trends. 3) We share the same spirit - to provide every citizen with cryptocurrency, though the realization differs - the RETN token economy is totally unclear from the whitepaper. Also, the liquidity issue has no place in it, whereas we describe token liquidity in detail. All in all, we're open for potential co-ops as the only reasonable goal for us is to make the loyalty management market more efficient and beneficial for all the participants.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Hello! There is no affection at all. The customer will either sell his 1 BIT or keep it. If he sells it, it will make a price a little lower than $100. If he keeps it, it will drive a price of BIT above $100. The store is independent of the BIT/USD price, please check out our previous answer. The rewards in BIT will be less when the BIT price is up. When the merchant wants to reward a $1000 buyer with $50 cash back, our software will automatically buy BIT tokens for $50 on the exchange and give them to the customer. So the merchant is independent of the token volatility.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Please understand that it‚Äôs not that straightforward. It depends a lot on the specific settings for every merchant. We are combining the rewards that you can use only in the given store with the incentives that stimulate better than points to buy and refer friends Think of a blogger who posted a link to a store‚Äôs product to his followers incentivized by a chance to earn crypto on their purchases. She wouldn‚Äôt have done so for the points. We are offering the solution which will mix both internal points and open-loop crypto rewards to achieve the maximum efficiency Also, don't forget that crypto rewards would be a great attractor of sales for any shop. People would love receiving crypto-cashback and other crypto-rewards, so they would be more at the shop offering them. That's another piece of value that we bring to e-commerce.

Body: Hello, Floriniya! Savedroid focuses on savings in cryptocurrencies and plays on the B2C field. Basically, they take a % from your bank account, convert it to various cryptocurrencies and that's pretty much all. We focus on bringing blockchain & cryptocurrency to loyalty space and play on the B2B2C field. We bring merchants a top quality loyalty software, which rewards their customers with crypto. Users will be incentivized by shops with our cryptocurrency BIT for purchases,  for friends referred, product reviews, video reviews, bug reports, likes, shares, etc. So we have almost nothing in similar with that project.

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Thank you for the question! There will be two types of service levels: 1. Managed ‚Äî when the entire software system and  BIT token balance of the merchant are managed by BitRewards. That would be $0/month. 2. On-premise ‚Äî when the merchant has its own server with Ethereum node for managing the BIT tokens. That would be about $10/month. Also, we are going to introduce a transaction fee for BIT token transfers from shops to users. We'll do it not earlier than after a year of operations, and probably later. The commission fee will not exceed 0.5%, probably will be lower, depending on the BIT token demand.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Hello! Since a lot of retailers are not quite ready to work with cryptocurrency exchanges directly, operations will be handled through the BitRewards‚Äô operator company. The operator will deal with all crypto transactions between the merchant and the customer and will give the bill in USD for the merchant.

Body: Hello! Thank you for the question! The Foundation manages the relationships with the different services providers, BIT tokens and cash reserves, remunerates the actors within the system that create the most value for the proliferation of BitRewards platform. One of these actors (and probably the most important one) would be the BitRewards company. The Foundation itself would be managed by the BitRewards DAO, as described in the WhitePaper (pages 32-33).

So the merchant is independent from the token volatility.

Body: Hello! Please understand that it‚Äôs not that straightforward. It depends a lot on the specific settings for every merchant. We are combining the rewards that you can use only in the given store with the incentives that stimulate better than points to buy and refer friends Think of a blogger who posted a link to a store‚Äôs product to his followers incentivized by a chance to earn crypto on their purchases. She wouldn‚Äôt have done so for the points. We are offering the solution which will mix both internal points and open-loop crypto rewards to achieve the maximum efficiency Also, don't forget that crypto rewards would be a great attractor of sales for any shop. People would love receiving crypto-cashback and other crypto-rewards, so they would be more at the shop offering them. That's another piece of value that we bring to e-commerce.

Body: Hello! Good question! Our token is based on the Ethereum blockchain. So we can't say that BitRewards itself is either PoS or PoW. Meanwhile, Ethereum currently is PoW, with a probability to switch to PoS in the future.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Hello, Feltana! Savedroid focuses on savings in cryptocurrencies and plays on the B2C field. Basically, they take a % from your bank account, convert it to various cryptocurrencies and that's pretty much all. We focus on bringing blockchain & cryptocurrency to loyalty space and play on the B2B2C field. We bring merchants a top quality loyalty software, which rewards their customers with crypto. Users will be incentivized by shops with our cryptocurrency BIT for purchases,  for friends referred, product reviews, video reviews, bug reports, likes, shares, etc. So we have almost nothing in similar with that project.

Body: Hello! Nope, the ideas are pretty much different, while we are both focused on the great market of improving retail business. 1. Body: Hello! There will be two types of service levels: 1. Managed ‚Äî when the entire software system and  BIT token balance of the merchant are managed by BitRewards. That would be $0/month. 2. On-premise ‚Äî when the merchant has its own server with Ethereum node for managing the BIT tokens. That would be about $10/month. Also, we are going to introduce a transaction fee for BIT token transfers from shops to users. We'll do it not earlier than after a year of operations, and probably later. The commission fee will not exceed 0.5%, probably will be lower, depending on the BIT token demand.

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Regarding Retainly - it's for sure an interesting project that deserves some attention. However, it's not accurate to compare it with BitRewards for a number of reasons: 1) One thing is to talk, another one is to show. BitRewards is based and backed by a successful product - GIFTD - that was launched in 2012. Our team have enough expertise to extract the most from the distributed ledger technology to apply an innovative approach towards loyalty management market. Working product means a lot. 2) We focus not only on cash-backs but on any reward systems, so giving customers a freedom to choose. It also gives a necessary flexibility to BitRewards regarding different market trends. 3) We share the same spirit - to provide every citizen with cryptocurrency, though the realization differs - the RETN token economy is totally unclear from the whitepaper. Also, the liquidity issue has no place in it, whereas we describe token liquidity in detail. All in all, we're open for potential co-ops as the only reasonable goal for us is to make the loyalty management market more efficient and beneficial for all the participants.

Body: Hello! Good question! Birdchain is a decentralized instant messaging platform, that gives an opportunity for regular users to earn extra income by selling their unused SMS messages, watching promotional videos, and selling their data. The team at Birdchain believes that easily and seamlessly earned monthly passive income will draw in an unprecedented amount of people to the crypto universe. The influx of new people will naturally lead to new funds, faster growth of markets, which will serve to develop other blockchain-based products and expand the reach of the current cryptocurrency market.

Body: Distributed ledgers and blockchain protocols bring unprecedented value to the loyalty program of the future: For users:  Rewards in cryptocurrency, which don‚Äôt depend on the success of the merchant Rewards, which appreciate rather than expire Easily redeemable or exchangeable into any other liquid asset Highly personalised, custom-tailored recommendations, rewards & discounts (see BitRecommendations)  For merchants:  Premium software free of charge, which increases the loyalty of users and sales Tokenization of standalone loyalty programs and merchant-specific tokens generation platform Use of API to frictionlessly connect any proprietary loyalty programs to BitRewards tokens or any other loyalty and rewards program Free BitRecommendations API working on blockchain, managed by DAO on IPFS  For business development and security:  DAO which ensures the efficiency of BitRewards network development Merchant data control, ensuring merchants own and benefit from their raw data Rewards for developers, who create successful solutions and merchants and customers, who incentivize the adoption of BitRewards network

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Hello! Please understand that we are much more than a cashback platform. We will give shoppers cashback in cryptocurrency, referral rewards in crypto, social actions rewards in crypto, etc., etc. Here is how we are going to work with cashback platforms such as LetyShops: 1. For those of them, which will collaborate with us, we will provide a solution to replace a cashback in fiat with cashback in BIT. So essentially they will become another source of the demand for BIT tokens. The interface, the brand, the website will stay the same for the shoppers, but the reward will change to BIT token from fiat. 2. As to those which will not collaborate with us, we are going to take their share of the market üôÇ as cashback in cryptocurrency is much more appealing to the end users than cashback in fiat. BIT tokens are an Etherium based currency. In case of the listing at the exchange, it will be possible to change them into crypto or fiat currency ‚Äî everything that the exchanges allow to do.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Regarding Retainly - it's for sure an interesting project that deserves some attention. However, it's not accurate to compare it with BitRewards for a number of reasons: 1) One thing is to talk, another one is to show. BitRewards is based and backed by a successful product - GIFTD - that was launched in 2012. Our team have enough expertise to extract the most from the distributed ledger technology to apply an innovative approach towards loyalty management market. Working product means a lot. 2) We focus not only on cash-backs but on any reward systems, so giving customers a freedom to choose. It also gives a necessary flexibility to BitRewards regarding different market trends. 3) We share the same spirit - to provide every citizen with cryptocurrency, though the realization differs - the RETN token economy is totally unclear from the whitepaper. Also, the liquidity issue has no place in it, whereas we describe token liquidity in detail. All in all, we're open for potential co-ops as the only reasonable goal for us is to make the loyalty management market more efficient and beneficial for all the participants.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Hello! Our token is based on the Ethereum blockchain. So we can't say that BitRewards itself is either PoS or PoW. Meanwhile, Ethereum currently is PoW, with a probability to switch to PoS in the future.

Body: Hi everyone, what if the value of 1 BIT gets to 100 and a store rewarded a customer 1 BIT for buying a product of 50$. How will this affect the rewarding system?

Author: Nairazdenek
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: I've heard you have some kind of system called bitrecommendations. what's that?

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Hello John! There is no affection at all. The customer will either sell his 1 BIT or keep it. If he sells it, it will make a price a little lower than $100. If he keeps it, it will drive a price of BIT above $100. The store is independent of the BIT/USD price, please check out our previous answer. The rewards in BIT will be less when the BIT price is up. When the merchant wants to reward a $1000 buyer with $50 cash back, our software will automatically buy BIT tokens for $50 on the exchange and give them to the customer. So the merchant is independent of the token volatility.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Good day Rabitha! There will be two types of service levels: 1. Managed ‚Äî when the entire software system and  BIT token balance of the merchant are managed by BitRewards. That would be $0/month. 2. On-premise ‚Äî when the merchant has its own server with Ethereum node for managing the BIT tokens. That would be about $10/month. Also, we are going to introduce a transaction fee for BIT token transfers from shops to users. We'll do it not earlier than after a year of operations, and probably later. The commission fee will not exceed 0.5%, probably will be lower, depending on the BIT token demand.

Body: Hello! Savedroid focuses on savings in cryptocurrencies and play on B2C field. Basically they take a % from your bank account, convert it to various cryptocurrencies and that's pretty much all. We focus on bringing blockchain & cryptocurrency to loyalty space and play on B2B2C field. We bring merchants a top quality loyalty software, which rewards their customers with crypto. Users will be incentivized by shops with our cryptocurrency BIT for purchases,  for friends referred, product reviews, video reviews, bug reports, likes, shares, etc. So we have almost nothing in similar with that project.

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Hello John! Please understand that it‚Äôs not that straightforward. It depends a lot on the specific settings for every merchant. We are combining the rewards that you can use only in the given store with the incentives that stimulate better than points to buy and refer friends Think of a blogger who posted a link to a store‚Äôs product to his followers incentivized by a chance to earn crypto on their purchases. She wouldn‚Äôt have done so for the points. We are offering the solution which will mix both internal points and open-loop crypto rewards to achieve the maximum efficiency Also, don't forget that crypto rewards would be a great attractor of sales for any shop. People would love receiving crypto-cashback and other crypto-rewards, so they would be more at the shop offering them. That's another piece of value that we bring to e-commerce.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Hello! There is no affection at all. The customer will either sell his 1 BIT or keep it. If he sells it, it will make a price a little lower than $100. If he keeps it, it will drive a price of BIT above $100. The store is independent of the BIT/USD price, please check out our previous answer. The rewards in BIT will be less when the BIT price is up. When the merchant wants to reward a $1000 buyer with $50 cash back, our software will automatically buy BIT tokens for $50 on the exchange and give them to the customer. So the merchant is independent of the token volatility.

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Regarding Retainly - it's for sure an interesting project that deserves some attention. However, it's not accurate to compare it with BitRewards for a number of reasons: 1) One thing is to talk, another one is to show. BitRewards is based and backed by a successful product - GIFTD - that was launched in 2012. Our team have enough expertise to extract the most from the distributed ledger technology to apply an innovative approach towards loyalty management market. Working product means a lot. 2) We focus not only on cash-backs but on any reward systems, so giving customers a freedom to choose. It also gives a necessary flexibility to BitRewards regarding different market trends. 3) We share the same spirit - to provide every citizen with cryptocurrency, though the realization differs - the RETN token economy is totally unclear from the whitepaper. Also, the liquidity issue has no place in it, whereas we describe token liquidity in detail. All in all, we're open for potential co-ops as the only reasonable goal for us is to make the loyalty management market more efficient and beneficial for all the participants.

Body: Hello! Unlike many other blockchain startups, we anticipate that only 27% of the total costs will be spent on product development because a lot of essential components of the system have already been developed and tested. The funds that we raise beyond the soft cap will be invested in sales marketing activities, which will help us sign up more merchants more quickly, creating a stronger network effect and delivering the product features faster. Additional funds will also be used for the opening of new geographical markets faster.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Thank you for the question! No, it isn't. First, we are real people ?? We are in the business for 5 years, working together at GIFTD (https://giftd.tech ) and building valuable marketing tools for e-commerce (see "Live Demo" on https://bitrewards.network). That makes us very different from the most of ICO projects in general, and loyalty-connected ICOs particularly. Also, there was almost nothing in Benebit's idea excepting the cashback, while we focus on many different rewards: cashback, friends referred bonus, likes & shares on social networks, product reviews, video reviews, website reviews, bug reports, etc. Our software is an advanced thing and it can be customized to any e-commerce business needs.

Body: Hello No, we wouldn't like to share it publicly as ICO market is a competitive space. However, some details may be shared already. We pursue a weighted strategy with regard to the online marketing campaign, so we've split it into three stages: - collection of analytics, targeting, key audiences - testing of segments in different countries, content adaptation, creatives and formats testing - full-scale ad coverage and targeting in chosen countries

Body: Hello! There will be two types of service levels: 1. Managed ‚Äî when the entire software system and  BIT token balance of the merchant are managed by BitRewards. That would be $0/month. 2. On-premise ‚Äî when the merchant has its own server with Ethereum node for managing the BIT tokens. That would be about $10/month. Also, we are going to introduce a transaction fee for BIT token transfers from shops to users. We'll do it not earlier than after a year of operations, and probably later. The commission fee will not exceed 0.5%, probably will be lower, depending on the BIT token demand.

Body: Hello! Unlike many other blockchain startups, we anticipate that only 27% of the total costs will be spent on product development because a lot of essential components of the system have already been developed and tested. The funds that we raise beyond the soft cap will be invested in sales marketing activities, which will help us sign up more merchants more quickly, creating a stronger network effect and delivering the product features faster. Additional funds will also be used for the opening of new geographical markets faster.

Body: Hey John! Yes, you can. As far as we accept only ETH or BTC, you may need to buy them for any fiat currencies at crypto-exchanges. While processing the exchange or transfer operation, please, specify the receiving/destination ETH or BTC wallet address provided in your personal online cabinet. Once the transaction is completed, the corresponding amount of tokens will be allocated to your personal account. Notice that exchanges and payment/transfer services may apply some additional fees - please, estimate the amount of your transfer accordingly.

Body: All merchants get access to the AI data analysis system. We call this BitRecommendations, which automatically recommends actions and rewards that are incentivizing the most productive behaviour of the customers for every particular merchant.

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Hello, Naira! Savedroid focuses on savings in cryptocurrencies and plays on the B2C field. Basically, they take a % from your bank account, convert it to various cryptocurrencies and that's pretty much all. We focus on bringing blockchain & cryptocurrency to loyalty space and play on the B2B2C field. We bring merchants a top quality loyalty software, which rewards their customers with crypto. Users will be incentivized by shops with our cryptocurrency BIT for purchases,  for friends referred, product reviews, video reviews, bug reports, likes, shares, etc. So we have almost nothing in similar with that project.

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Hi! Good question! In accordance with our partnership plan, BitRewards will give AdHive access to thousands of e-commerce businesses connected to the BitRewards platform (almost 5,000 to be connected by 2021). This opens up a wide range of opportunities for working with large advertisers and brands that are interested in a high-tech solution from AdHive.

Body: BitRewards has strong competitive advantages in comparison with other loyalty systems: - Free of charge - Simple installation which doesn't require technical expertise - Access to a large number of loyal customers of partner retailers in the BitRewards  Following the current trend, the focus in promotion of BitRewards Network will be made on content marketing, which will push the message to merchants that the BitRewards Network offers much more than any competitor can offer, and moreover it‚Äôs for free.

Body: The rewards in BIT are independent from ETH/USD price or BIT/USD price.  When the merchant wants to rewards a $1000 buyer with $50 cashback, our software will automatically buy BIT tokens for $50 on the exchange and give them to the customer. So the merchant is independent from the token volatility.

Body: Hi Feltana! Thank you for the question.  Here are the top-3 reasons for using blockchain in BitRewards:  1. It allows users to get rewards in crypto, which appreciate in value rather then expire; 2. It makes the whole system community-driven by means of DAO BitRewards; 3. It provides BitRewards with unique business model (premium software for free)  Also, please check out our article on Medium: https://medium.com/@bitrewards/why-blockchain-is-a-smart-solution-for-loyalty-programs-9443af408f71

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Hey Floriniya! Yes, you can. As far as we accept only ETH or BTC, you may need to buy them for any fiat currencies at crypto-exchanges. While processing the exchange or transfer operation, please, specify the receiving/destination ETH or BTC wallet address provided in your personal online cabinet. Once the transaction is completed, corresponding amount of tokens will be allocated to your personal account. Notice that exchanges and payment/transfer services may apply some additional fees - please, estimate the amount for your transfer accordingly.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Hello, Tulsasisiht! Savedroid focuses on savings in cryptocurrencies and play on B2C field. Basically they take a % from your bank account, convert it to various cryptocurrencies and that's pretty much all.  We focus on bringing blockchain & cryptocurrency to loyalty space and play on B2B2C field. We bring merchants a top quailty loyalty software, which rewards their customers with crypto. Users will be incentivized by shops with our cryptocurrency BIT for purchases,  for friends referred, product reviews, video reviews, bug reports, likes, shares, etc.  So we have almost nothing in similar with that project.

Body: Hi Rabitha, thank you for the question. We plan to fully open source our platform and provide the tools' code to the developers so that they can use the existing or create new features or new tools on the top of the platform, offer them to the online stores on their own and earn their commission in BIT tokens.  The IP on the platform and the tools is owned by our mother company, www.giftd.tech, and our lawyers are planning the activities for transfer of IP rights and registration of patents to BitRewards starting from the first quarter of 2018. We also hold some AI-related patents, which will be used in the BitRewards tools.  Looking forward to your further questions and comments.

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Hello Jeroyc! It will depend on the seller, as it's closely connected to the return policy of the seller. Some sellers may issue immediate cashback, especially those who sell digital content. Others will be offering a deferred cashback. We expect the time lag to be less than 2 weeks for most of the merchants. Anyway, from the user's point of view, the cashback tokens will be displayed on the balance instantly after the payment, so the users will feel safe. But the tokens may become spendable and withdrawable after some time, in case of "deferred cashback".

Body: Hello! Unlike many other blockchain startups, we anticpate that only 27% of the total costs will be spent on product development, because a lot of essential components of the system have already been developed and tested. The funds that we raise beyond the soft cap will be invested in sales marketing activities, which will help us sign up more merchants more quickly, creating a stronger network effect and delivering the product features faster. Additional funds will also be used for opening of new geographical markets faster.

Body: Quote from: Tulsasisiht on April 13, 2018, 06:02:43 AM Hey, is there any known similar blockchain project? I feel like customer loyalty programs is a hard-fought business field We are closely watching our competitors working on loyalty and rewards blockchain projects. And we have a few strong competitive advantages. Namely, the great tested product, integrations with website builders and partnerships, with good scaling potential, our ability to build and run profitable complex businesses, team that works together for 5 years and knows the customers‚Äô needs very well, one of the strongest tech teams that work on blockchain in the retail, and strong ICO team and advisors, whose expertise guarantees the token sale success.  Besides, we don‚Äôt have any competitor, who would do exactly the same. And even if it was, we would probably welcome it, as the market is big enough for several robust players.

Body: A small commission for the BIT tokens' distributed rewards will be imposed starting from year two. The commission is credited at the BitRewards Foundation's account. This process also creates an additional demand on the tokens. At the end of period (annually) the Foundation allocates the necessary budget for the project further development. The Foundation may also have other sources of income.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: That coin (XBR) belongs to the CryptoJacks project. We have nothing to do with them.  That's a dead project, according to their social networks.  Also please note that they had "CJ" token symbol previously, they've switched to XBR token symbol (BitRewards) in the beginning of February. And we've been using that name for almost 6 months.  Our token symbol is BIT, not XBR.

Body: Hello, please read how our business model works 1. The retailers connect to the BitRewards loyalty system by installing the readymade GIFTD extension or by integrating it with their own loyalty system. 2. This solution rewards customers with BIT for their and their friends‚Äô purchases as well as other actions. The module performs all the required token processing through the BitRewards platform. 3. The value of BIT may appreciate because of the limited initial issuance of 2 billion tokens and the constant leading demand for tokens from the growing number of retailers joining the platform. 4. The probable appreciation of BIT encourages customers to save their tokens instead of redeeming them for purchases, thereby also reducing the amount of free-floating tokens.

Body: Hi! Yes, we have an AI-based recommendation system called BitRecommendations.  Product recommendations BitRecommendations system is based on the data and machine learning algorithms. It provides API to any merchant, developer, or service provider. The API allows any merchant to receive highly precise product recommendations starting from day oneof the operations, even with low user traffic, because of the application of algorithms, which make decisions after learning on thousands of other merchants and millions of data points.  Reward recommendations BitRecommendations analyses the rewards that were given by the loyalty systems of different merchants, aggregates the received data, and makes predictions about the future rewards.  Financial scoring Application of the blockchain technology and the crowdsourced nature of the platform will allow the merchants to achieve a new level of intelligence and economic efficiency previously unaffordable for the small and medium-sized business.

Body: Hi, Jeroyc. Thank you for your question.  Here are the top-3 reasons for using blockchain in BitRewards:  1. It allows users to get rewards in crypto, which appreciate in value rather then expire; 2. It makes the whole system community-driven by means of DAO BitRewards; 3. It provides BitRewards with unique business model (premium software for free)  Also, please check out our article on Medium: https://medium.com/@bitrewards/why-blockchain-is-a-smart-solution-for-loyalty-programs-9443af408f71

Body: By default, the crypto-wallet will store private keys on the BitRewards Network servers in an encrypted form. Body: BitRewards is a future of loyalty systems worldwide: decentralized rewards and loyalty platform that enables retailers give cashbacks to their customers in cryptocurrency directly to their crypto-wallets. Body: For maximum security, the private key for the retailer‚Äôs crypto-wallet will reside at the retailer‚Äôs servers. The less secure, but simpler way is to use BitRewards API that stores the keys. If needed, the retailer can open two crypto-wallets ‚Äî cold (for large amounts) and hot (for current transactions). The "cold" wallet should be shielded from online connection and managed manually. The "hot" wallet should be connected to the other software of the retailer (CMS, accounting software, etc.) through a private API.

Body: Our goal is to make the system completely free for the merchants. It's a way to make BIT solutions popular.  Going into details, there will be two types of service levels: 1. Managed ‚Äî when the entire software system and  BIT token balance of the merchant are managed by BitRewards. That would be $0/month. 2. On-premise ‚Äî when the merchant has it's own server with Ethereum node for managing the BIT tokens. That would be about $10/month.  Also, we are going to introduce a transaction fee for BIT token transfers from shops to users. We'll do it not earlier than after a year of operations, and probably later. The commission fee will not exceed 0.5%, probably will be lower, depending on the BIT token demand.

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Actually, it performs well for merchants using GIFTD.  In 2016 we finally saw a spike in the sale of e-gift cards for our clients! The customers got a taste of the convenience of instant gifting, while right on the website's store.  We expect this trend to continue since 10% of all purchases are made as gifts (which are often made last minute).

But we don't plan to impose the limitations on the merchants ‚Äî they can both issue points or BIT tokens to reward their users on our system. E.g., they can choose to reward for shares and likes with points, and for the purchases of the referred friends with the crypto. We aim to give the suite of tools that solve the merchants' problems better, rather than tie them our platform. It will result in broader adoption in the long run  The merchants want to have a tool that enables them rewarding not only with points, but with something the users deem more valuable - cash, or cryptocurrency (which in certain aspects is better than cash).

Body: You can do everything by yourself but there is no reason to do that as we will provide merchants top-class loyalty software for free ‚Äî with support, integration, customization included.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: We are constantly working on the customer development, and know the needs of our customers, e-commerce businesses very well. They are struggling with attraction, conversion, activation, and retention of their users and want a solution.  The statistics show that online merchants are spending annually billions of dollars on such solutions and often do so extremely inefficiently - over 50% of loyalty programs are closing within the first year after the launch, because they don‚Äôt pay off and create more customer frustration, than satisfaction  The user experiences in loyalty programs leave much to be desired, leading to clients frustration and worsening of their loyalty.  BitRewards will equip the merchants with the premium set of tools, which will increase their revenue by double-digit percentages. The software, which usually costs hundreds of dollars will be offered free of charge.  We don't plan to impose the limitations on the merchants ‚Äî they can both issue points or BIT tokens to reward their users on our system. E.g., they can choose to reward for shares and likes with points, and for the purchases of the referred friends with the crypto. We aim to give the suite of tools that solve the merchants' problems better, rather than tie them  our platform. It will result in broader adoption in the long run  The merchants want to have a tool that enables them rewarding not only with points, but with something the users deem more valuable - cash, or cryptocurrency (which in certain aspects is better than cash).  The adoption from the stores presently will, besides the other factors, be driven by the fact that rewarding in crypto helps to stand out among the competition, and in the future, it will become the industry standard and will be demanded by the users.  The question of the ban on crypto often arises. However, it will already hardly be possible. We are following the regulators and in reality, approve of the majority of their decisions. Because they show the desire to shield the large public from scam, misconduct, and negligence, rather than uproot the cryptocurrencies as a class. SEC's head of blockchain division is actually very supportive of the blockchain technology and cryptocurrency developments. Regulators have hard times now figuring out how to approach a lot of concepts and technologies, as the speed of evolution is extraordinary.  Therefore we are most assured that very soon the crypto will become a standard of the retail industry and will be adopted by almost every store. It's not hard to figure out how to legitimize the typical retail transactions in crypto, and given that a lot of great minds are applying their skills to this area, it's a matter short time when we will see it. If you think about it, crypto is much safer and more transparent, than physical paper cash, in which no one objects transacting.

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Merchants won't be able to reward customers with other cryptocurrencies but they can both issue points or BIT tokens to reward their users on our system. E.g., they can choose to reward for shares and likes with points, and for the purchases of the referred friends with the crypto.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: There will be two types of service levels: 1. Managed ‚Äî when the entire software system and  BIT token balance of the merchant are managed by BitRewards. That would be $0/month. 2. On-premise ‚Äî when the merchant has its own server with Ethereum node for managing the BIT tokens. That would be about $10/month.  Also, we are going to introduce a transaction fee for BIT token transfers from shops to users. We'll do it not earlier than after a year of operations, and probably later. The commission fee will not exceed 0.5%, probably will be lower, depending on the BIT token demand.

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Customers can spend their tokens in stores connected to BitRewards platform, but you will get a higher value (from +20% to +50% more value) if you spend these BIT tokens in the same shop that had issued them to you. This allows shops to hold loyalty users and do repeat sales (which is an actual goal of a loyalty program for shops).

Body: there will be two types of service levels: 1. Managed ‚Äî when the entire software system and  BIT token balance of the merchant are managed by BitRewards. That would be $0/month. 2. On-premise ‚Äî when the merchant has it's own server with Ethereum node for managing the BIT tokens. That would be about $10/month.  Also, we are going to introduce a transaction fee for BIT token transfers from shops to users. We'll do it not earlier than after a year of operations, and probably later. The commission fee will not exceed 0.5%, probably will be lower, depending on the BIT token demand.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: The parent to BitRewards business (GIFTD) has more than 500 clients in Europe, who mainly are small and medium-sized businesses, which is our target audience. Among the globally recognized names, we have GoPro.ru, Tui, and several others; we also service Snowqueen.ru, a top Russian fashion and beauty retailer (2.5 million monthly visitors), Startuphouse.com (the startup community in San Francisco, USA), Premierdeadsea-usa.com (skincare products, USA), MadRobots.ru (a marketplace of gadgets), Promosoundgroup.net (global online music promotion service), Marwin.kz (top Kazakh kids' store) and hundreds of the smaller businesses. For BitRewards, we have signed the letter of intent with Ecwid (https://goo.gl/2HnrG5), one of the top e-commerce website builders with over 1 million merchants in 175 countries headquartered in San Diego, CA, USA.  Also, we are negotiating with big partners worldwide at the moment, our CEO and CTO do a constant search for new partners at the roadshow

Body: No, there's no direct effect.  The rewards in BIT are independent of ETH/USD price or BIT/USD price.  When the merchant wants to reward a $1000 buyer with $50 cashback, our software will automatically buy BIT tokens for $50 on the exchange and give them to the customer. So the merchant is independent of the token volatility.

Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: We are much more than a cashback platform. We will give shoppers cashback in cryptocurrency, referral rewards in crypto, social actions rewards in crypto, etc., etc.  Here is how we are going to work with cashback platforms such as LetyShops: 1. For those of them, which will collaborate with us, we will provide a solution to replace a cashback in fiat with cashback in BIT. So essentially they will become another source of the demand for BIT tokens. The interface, the brand, the website will stay the same for the shoppers, but the reward will change to BIT token from fiat. 2. As to those which will not collaborate with us, we are going to take their share of the market üôÇ as cashback in cryptocurrency is much more appealing to the end users than cashback in fiat.  BIT tokens are an Etherium based currency. In case of the listing at the exchange, it will be possible to change them into crypto or fiat currency ‚Äî everything that the exchanges allow to do.

Whether we will see its value go up or down, Egorov is quite certain BIT is set to rise in value and popularity; only time will tell. Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Quote from: Veecker on March 01, 2018, 07:13:24 PM According to the statistics, average time for a user to participate in the loyalty program is 3 months. Are you going to change that? Hello, our concept suggests just that - immediate rewards, that are super-easy to redeem, and better-than-cash rewards in crypto, which never expire and tend to go up in value. Thus, customers will be interested and highly motivated to take part in the loyality program for a long time. It is a perfect way for the merchant to communicate better with the customer and achieve both higher sales and better customer satisfaction.

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Hello, so we believe it brings certain benefits for users, merchants and business development and security: For users: Rewards in cryptocurrency, which don‚Äôt depend on the success of the merchant Rewards, which appreciate rather than expire Easily redeemable or exchangeable into any other liquid asset Highly personalised, custom-tailored recommendations, rewards & discounts (see BitRecommendations)  For merchants: Premium software free of charge, which increases the loyalty of users and sales Tokenization of standalone loyalty programs and merchant-specific tokens generation platform Use of API to frictionlessly connect any proprietary loyalty programs to BitRewards tokens or any other loyalty and rewards program Free BitRecommendations API working on blockchain, managed by DAO on IPFS  For business development and security: DAO which ensures the efficiency of BitRewards network development Merchant data control, ensuring merchants own and benefit from their raw data Rewards for developers, who create successful solutions and merchants and customers, who incentivize the adoption of BitRewards network

Author: BitRewardsTeam
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Hi!  Ecwid is an e-commerce platform that enables individuals and businesses to add a comprehensive online store to any existing website, with over 1 million sellers in 175 countries. These easy-to-install solutions can be integrated into any online website, mobile site or social network and it can be as quick as uploading a YouTube video. It offers a freemium SaaS-based platform, compatible with any existing site and payment system. Ecwid helps merchants converge their offline and online sales through its POS and mobile POS integration so that they can sell their products anywhere, at any time, and from any device.

You may find your referral link in your Wallet: https://wallet.bitrewards.network  Only those who bought at least 10 000 BIT tokens (‚âà0.26 ETH) can participate in the referral program and earn BIT on their friends' purchases. Body: I'd like to tell you about why retails need loyalty program.  Businesses spend an increasing amount of resources wrestling for customers‚Äô attention, and this is only half the task: they also have to retain their attention. Studies show that acquiring a new customer is anywhere from 5 to 25 times more expensive than retaining an existing one. And customers are also easily switching brands, particularly when the competition is a click away. So retailers must invest in their customers‚Äô loyalty. Lots of data show that loyal customers stay longer, buy more and more often, cost less to process, help in price competition, tell their friends about their experiences, and provide valuable feedback.  Join us!

Author: MakVitaly
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Bitrewards business model  BitRewards Network profits from the growth in value of the BIT token, therefore it provides basic customer software and apps for the retailers free of charge. Although it will be possible for the developers of the Smart Rewards apps within the BitRewards ecosystem to charge the merchants for the customary tools, the BitRewards in its first year of operations will not take commission from transactions, aiming to provide maximum efficiency to the merchants. This demonstrates that BitRewards is committed to the growth in the value of BIT, which strategically corresponds to the interests of tokens holders. Our strategy is the maximum adoption and utility of the apps that are built on BitRewards platform among retailers, which will increase the demand for tokens, their adoption and price.  After 12 months of operations we will introduce 0.5% commission on the sales transactions with BitRewards tokens. Also, the special administration entity BitRewards Operator can offer paid services as a result of retailers‚Äô inquiries, as they will be interested in our expertise.  Such services may include: - Customary apps for specific business goals (e.g. a sophisticated bounty campaign); - Adjustments of settings and the testing of hypothesis of the rewards and other parameters of the loyalty system; - The integration of customary blockchain solutions in the existing corporate loyalty program;  The BitRewards Network does not see such development as a priority and considers it the most efficient to transfer such types of important services to independent contractors, BitRewards enthusiasts, and community members with which we plan to work. This will help the adoption of the BitRewards platform and broader acceptance of BIT.  The value of the network grows in the process of adoption by a large number of participants, who start using BitRewards. According to the estimates, in case a conservative forecast (reaching a softcap of $3,000,000), the targeted funds will be sufficient to sign up 5000 retailers in 3 years, which will generate a monthly demand for BIT worth $4.9 million.

Author: MakVitaly
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: How are we going to sign up the vast number of merchants?  It is planned to use the following marketing channels:  - Social networks Content production for our blog, doubling down on email, social media and other outbound activities. This will help us source leads. We have a pretty high conversion rate after the live demo presentation of our solutions: after the initial presentation, 30-50% of the clients covert within 1-2 months.  In the USA we‚Äôve found out that there‚Äôs a great demand from 2 interesting verticals inside the ecommerce space, which we‚Äôve never explored before: 1. Event organizers who sell tickets for events through Eventbrite, for which the organizers want to reward points to their clients, who can later redeem these points for new ticket purchases. 2. Start-ups, who need a referral system and are ready to pay cash for new clients. We are excited about these developments and plan to sign up several hundreds of active merchants in the first year.  - Workshops, webinars and events Hosting seminars, webinars and participating in conferences, as well as partnering with digital agencies who service online stores, and for whom we have already launched a partner affiliate program.  -Partnerships Co-operation with website builders and CMSs for online stores (platforms like Shopify, Magento, WordPress, Ecwid, etc.), as a lot of our clients are coming from these sources and they are the easiest to convert. They are interested in the development of the e-commerce ecosystem, and are very keen adopters of the services that help online stores‚Äô efficiency. Other non-competing SAAS, servicing a similar target audience are also interested in co-operation.

Body: A question I've is how the shops and merchants manage the price of the tokens which they buy off the exchange if the token price fluctuates and this leads to the question of why an investor would invest in your ICO if on the one hand, you need to keep the price stable while on the other hand, the investor would like to see the token increases in price, and go as high as possible so they can profit from it by trading it on the exchange.  If the token increases in price, it will not be attractive for the shops and merchants to buy but it will be attractive for the investors as well as the customers.  Do you have a solution for this contradiction?

Author: MakVitaly
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê[ANN][PRE-ICO][BitRewards | Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform]‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Body: Good question.  Sure we have a solution.  The answer is simple: the shop buys BIT tokens whenever it needs to rewards a customer, not in advance.  For example, imagine a shop has a loyalty program and rewards customers with 5% cashback in BIT tokens. Whenever someone makes a purchase for $1000, the store uses BitRewards software and buys BIT tokens for $50, dependless on current BIT exchange rate, and gives these BIT tokens to the customer.  The good thing is that the entire process happens automatically, our software will use BitRewards Liquidity Smart-Contract and purchase BIT tokens with ETH, USDT or other popular ERC-20 tokens automatically whenever it's needed.  So the BIT exchange may grow indefinitely, and it will be attractive for merchants at any given moment.  Thank you for your interest!
